comments.en:
The magicolor 2300 DL is a network color laser printer with a 2003 street price of $600-$800 USD. This printer is supported by the foo2zjs free software printer driver.

Note that the older Minolta magicolor 2300 DL and the newer Konica Minolta magicolor 2300 DL are not 100% equal. So it is not sure whether the Minolta magicolor 2300 DL perhaps also works with the driver from Konica Minolta.

Consumables/Refills:
Toner Black (4500 prints) - $79
Toner Yellow (4500 prints) - $119
Toner Magenta (4500 prints) - $119
Toner Cyan (4500 prints) - $119
Waste Toner Box (25000 prints) - $19
OPC Drum Catridge (45000 prints) - $149
Part numbers: 1710517-005, 1710517-006, 1710517-007, 1710517-008, 1710522-001, 1710520-001
